body.name: Swbvs Firm Double Mattress, 12 Inch Memory Foam Full Size Mattress, Full Bed Mattress in a Box Pressure Relief & Firm Mattress Double Size…
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 35 mins
features: 【Premium Support & Spinal Alignment】 Experience superior support and proper spinal alignment with the Swbvs Firm Full Mattress, featuring individually encased pocket springs. Each spring works independently to provide targeted support, contouring to your body's curves and promoting a healthy sleep posture.

【Pressure Relief & Comfort】 The firmness of the Swbvs double mattress, combined with its pocket spring system, offers effective pressure point relief. The springs adapt to your body's weight and shape, reducing pressure on sensitive areas and providing a comfortable sleep surface.

【Minimal Motion Transfer & Undisturbed Sleep】 The Swbvs full size Mattress's pocket springs not only contribute to personalized support but also minimize motion transfer. Enjoy uninterrupted sleep even if your sleeping partner or pets move during the night, thanks to the individual spring construction.

【Convenient Delivery & Setup】 The Swbvs double bed mattress is compressed, vacuum-sealed, and neatly rolled up for efficient delivery. This compression packing ensures easy handling and transportation. Once unpacked, the mattress will fully expand and restore its original shape within 72 hours.

【Warranty & Peace of Mind】 Backed by a comprehensive warranty, the Swbvs firm full mattress provides peace of mind. Enjoy the assurance that your investment is protected. Additionally, our dedicated customer service is available to address any queries or concerns you may have throughout your mattress ownership.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features: Super Stretch Fabric: Experience the bliss of a natural and breathable fabric that provides excellent lift and reduces motion disturbance for a more restful sleep.Pressure Relief Memory Foam: Enjoy an optimal temperature sleeping surface that conforms perfectly to every curve of your body, ensuring unparalleled comfort.Fireproof Protection: Rest easy with our specially treated Anti-Fire Foam, coated with fireproof substances for a safer sleeping environment.High Density Support: Benefit from added layers of firm high density foam that provide exceptional support from head to toe.Individually Wrapped Coil System: Our advanced technology employs independently encased coils to minimize motion disturbance and relieve pressure points, delivering the ultimate in comfort and support.High Density Base Foam: Enhanced support for the innersprings, ensuring long-lasting durability. Product Details: Comfort Level: FirmMattress Type: InnerspringProduct Highlights: Breathable, Edge Support, Pressure Relief, Low Motion Transfer Experience the epitome of comfort and support with our cutting-edge mattress designed to give you a peaceful and rejuvenating night's sleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love coming home every day just to sleep now. It’s the first mattress I ever bought since living alone and I love it. Great for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Using in bedroom that is not often used. Feels pretty good when you lay down on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice mattress for the money but if you are looking for a soft mattress this isn’t the one for you it’s firm. I personally am getting a pillow topper for it but even without it, it is comfortable just not quite perfect for me. I would recommend to anyone looking for a durable bed on a budget :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used to sell serta mattresses and in my opinion this mattress out of the box is built better. Definitely competitivewith $600+ mattresses for only a fraction of the price. It gets more comfortable everyday as it takes 72hrs to fully fill but I slept on it a few hours after opening. Comes vacuum sealed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great replacement with easy set up. I have two more mattresses to replace, I will be ordering more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Zero Stars ! No memory foam, not firm, and impossible to return!
reviews.reviewText: My first terrible experience with Amazon. This is the first time purchasing a large size item from Amazon. Mattress purchased was received on Dec 22nd and does not match its product description. This is not a firm mattress as stated and there is no memory foam feeling when on it. You feel the coils!Scheduled a return on the Dec 23rd and Amazon confirmed pickup outside my home Dec 27th. This is a king mattress that I took the day off to push out of my bedroom alone into the entrance only to see Amazon canceled the pickup with no notification to me!!! I will never buy large items from them again. Impossible to get assistance over the phone and now the pickup is scheduled for Dec 28th but I don’t know if my job will give me the day on short notice. This has been so frustrating and all out disappointing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I haven't had a new bed in years and I haven't slept more in years than I have since I got this mattress. I wish I would have gotten one years ago!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Where is there memory foam???
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bed because the price was right and I need one asap. This is not a terrible mattress but I got it for the memory foam and there is none. I can feel every spring. I just added a topper and called it good.

I have been using this mattress for 2+ months. It is "firm" and very supportive (as I like it). Well built, no quality issues. I like the sandwich foam + coil spring design.Sleep is restful and I have not had any "pressure points" . So for me this mattress is just right in terms of firmness combined with the top layer foam's contouring to my body.Recommended!

reviews.reviewTitle: Does the trick for the price point.
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for an adult kid who moved back home. She says it's comfortable and likes it. That's all that matters for this price point.

I ordered the extra firm and glad I did. This mattress provides excellent support and has helped with my back and hip pain. Not tossing and turning trying to get comfortable anymore. It isn’t as thick / lush as the mattress I replaced with this, and wished they had that option and it’s a bit squeaky when you sit on the sides of it. I’m still amazed at how compressed this was on delivery however it bounced right into shape with I an hour (even though they say it might take up to 72hrs). I was not disappointed. Well worth the $

This mattress is firm but comfortable. I usually wake with sore shoulders, neck or back. Since getting this mattress in late December, I haven’t had any pain. My partner and I are both mainly side sleepers.It was delivered fast and hassle free. It sprung into shape quite fast, not quite the advised 72 hours. More like 2 days.Recommended.

reviews.reviewTitle: A medium/firm mattress that is so comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: I found it difficult to pick out a mattress online because the feedback is so subjective and varied for each brand and size. This one also had its share of mixed reviews so I was hesitant, but in the end it was worth it.Although it is suggested that you wait up to 72 hours for the mattress to decompress, we only waited about 6 hours, and it was great. Absolutely no smell whatsoever, took about 10 seconds to decompress, came with a small tool to slice the bag open safely and was delivered right to our door by Purolator Courier.We’ve been sleeping on it for a few nights now and I certainly do not feel the coils at all. The top is extremely soft and you sink in ever so slightly. This isn’t a firm or a soft mattress, it’s a medium firmness which is exactly what we wanted. I have my best night sleep now that we’ve changed mattresses and I would definitely purchase this again in a heartbeat.There is very little movement for my partner when I toss at night. I also find the mattress fairly quiet with minimal squeaking from the springs.A great product overall for less than $300, so happy we chose this one!
